mapper.select: SELECT cartNo , (SELECT productName FROM product WHERE productNo = A.productNo) as productName , productNo , size , color , quantity , userId , (SELECT salePrice FROM product WHERE productNo = A.productNo) as salePrice , (SELECT salePrice * A.quantity FROM product WHERE productNo = A.productNo) as totalPrice , (SELECT mainImage FROM product WHERE productNo = A.productNo) as mainImage , (SELECT category FROM product WHERE productNo = A.productNo) as category FROM cart A WHERE cartNo = #{cartNo}

SELECT merchant_uid , productNo , quantity , color , size , totalPrice , (SELECT salePrice FROM product WHERE productNo = A.productNo) as salePrice , (SELECT category FROM product WHERE productNo = A.productNo) as category , (SELECT mainImage FROM product WHERE productNo = A.productNo) as mainImage , (SELECT productName FROM product WHERE productNo = A.productNo) as productName FROM orderdetail A WHERE merchant_uid = #{merchant_uid}
